full_summary:
# Canadian Government Tender Announcement

**Bid Opportunity**:

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting bids for the purchase of 53-foot direct health measures semi-trailers. This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number Doc4023625388 dated June 19, 2023, with a closing of August 17, 2023 at 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT).

**Bid Details**:

* Bid Reference Number: WS4022390909
* Amendment Number: 11
* Solicitation Number: WS4022390909
* Publication Date: October 3, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: November 23, 2023, at 14:00 (EST)
* Expected Contract Start Date: August 14, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: Ongoing

**Bid Scope**:

Statistics Canada is seeking the purchase of 53-foot direct health measures semi-trailers, as well as related items, as detailed in the bid documentation. The selected bidder will be required to provide trailers that meet the specifications outlined in Annex “A” – Pricing and Annex “B” - Specification - Direct Health Measures Semi-Trailers.

**Key Features**:

* Length: 53 feet
* Mobile Laboratory
* Product and material trailers
* Manufacture of transport equipment

**Trade Agreements**:

This bid is open to Canadian companies, in compliance with the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Procurement Method**:

The bid will be awarded through an open bidding process.

**Contact Information**:

For further information or clarification regarding this bid opportunity, please contact David Murray at david.murray@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
